description: A classic salad made with romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and a dressing made with garlic, anchovies, lemon juice, and olive oil. Perfect as a side or as a main course when topped with grilled chicken or shrimp.

A Mediterranean-style salad made with crisp lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, red onions, feta cheese, and Kalamata olives. Served with a tangy vinaigrette dressing, this salad is a refreshing and healthy choice.
An Italian salad made with ripe tomatoes, fresh mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves. Drizzled with olive oil and balsamic glaze, this salad is a simple and delicious appetizer or side dish.
